name: posterizarr
description: Posterizarr is a self-hosted automation tool that integrates with Radarr/Sonarr to generate custom movie and TV show posters. It simplifies managing artwork for Plex and Jellyfin libraries.
features: Automated poster generation: Automatically create custom posters for movies and TV shows in your library.
Radarr integration: Connect with Radarr to sync movie metadata and generate posters automatically.
Sonarr integration: Integrate with Sonarr for TV show poster generation and library management.
Template customization: Choose from multiple poster templates or create custom designs.
Batch processing: Generate posters for entire libraries or specific collections in bulk.
Media server sync: Automatically update posters in Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby libraries.
Quality control: Preview generated posters before applying them to your media library.
Metadata overlay: Add ratings, release years, and other metadata overlays to poster designs.
Style consistency: Maintain consistent poster styling across your entire media collection.
Manual overrides: Manually select or upload custom posters for specific titles when needed.
Scheduling: Configure automatic poster generation on a schedule for new additions.
Web interface: Manage poster generation and view results through an intuitive web dashboard.
